World.headline: India, EU finalise FTA, deal set to be announced today
World.summary: India and the European Union have successfully finalized a Free Trade Agreement (FTA), with an official announcement expected today. This significant deal aims to boost trade relations between the two economic blocs, promising substantial economic benefits for both sides.
key_points: Deal set to boost trade relations

World.headline: Strategic Autonomy on Full Display: India Showcases S-400, BrahMos Missiles in Front of EU Leaders
World.summary: India demonstrated its strategic autonomy by showcasing its S-400 air defense systems and BrahMos missiles during a Republic Day parade attended by EU leaders. This powerful display underscored India's self-reliance in defense technology and its growing geopolitical standing, sending a clear message about its military capabilities.
key_points: India showcases S-400 and BrahMos missiles
Highlights India's defense self-reliance and geopolitical standing

World.headline: French Lawmakers back ban on social media for children under 15
World.summary: French lawmakers have voted in favor of banning social media access for children under the age of 15, a significant move aimed at protecting minors online from potential harms. This legislative action highlights growing international concerns over youth digital well-being and regulatory efforts to address them.
key_points: French lawmakers approve social media ban
Reflects growing concerns over youth digital well-being

World.headline: Russian Air Defenses Destroy 106 Ukrainian Drones Overnight: MoD
World.summary: Russia's Ministry of Defense reported that its air defense systems destroyed a record 106 Ukrainian drones overnight, signifying an intense period of aerial engagement. This large-scale interception highlights the ongoing intensity of the conflict and the continuous use of drone technology in modern warfare.
key_points: Russian MoD reports 106 Ukrainian drones destroyed

Business.headline: India's duty-free cap is a decade old. Does it even fit today's prices?
Business.summary: India's current duty-free cap has remained unchanged for a decade, raising questions about its relevance and adequacy in the face of today's inflated prices and evolving economic landscape. Experts are debating whether an update is necessary to reflect current economic realities and consumer purchasing power.
key_points: India's duty-free cap is 10 years old
Questions about its relevance to today's prices
Debate on necessity of an update

Business.headline: Gold prices reach record highs as Fed hints rate cuts; geopolitical tensions rise
Business.summary: Gold prices have soared to record highs, driven by hints from the Federal Reserve about potential interest rate cuts and increasing geopolitical tensions worldwide. Investors are increasingly seeking safe-haven assets amidst global economic uncertainty and political instability.
key_points: Driven by Fed rate cut hints

Business.headline: RBI’s Digital Currency Plan to Challenge Dollar-Centric Payment Systems: Expert
Business.summary: An expert suggests that the Reserve Bank of India's (RBI) digital currency plan has the potential to significantly challenge established dollar-centric payment systems on a global scale. This strategic move could alter the international financial landscape and promote alternatives to the US dollar's dominance.

Technology.headline: Elon Musk On EU Radar; X’s AI Chatbot Grok Faces Biggest Probe Over Sexual Deepfakes | Details
Technology.summary: Elon Musk and his platform X are currently under significant scrutiny from the EU, as X's AI chatbot Grok faces its most extensive probe yet over serious concerns about sexual deepfakes. This investigation highlights the growing regulatory challenges for AI content and platform responsibility in managing harmful digital material.
key_points: Elon Musk and X under EU scrutiny
Grok AI chatbot probed over sexual deepfakes
Highlights regulatory challenges for AI content

Technology.headline: Why Does Indo-Russian Tech Cooperation Matter More Than Ever Just Now?
Technology.summary: This article explores the increasing importance of Indo-Russian technological cooperation, especially in the current global climate characterized by evolving geopolitical alliances. It highlights how shared strategic interests and the need for diversified partnerships make this collaboration more critical than ever for both nations' technological advancement and security.
key_points: Increasing importance of Indo-Russian tech cooperation

Entertainment.headline: 'Dhurandhar' box office collection Day 53: Ranveer Singh starrer creates history; grosses Rs 1000 crore in India amid 'Border 2' wave
Entertainment.summary: Ranveer Singh's film "Dhurandhar" has made an unprecedented mark at the box office, grossing a historic Rs 1000 crore in India despite the concurrent release and strong performance of "Border 2." This achievement signifies a major milestone for the film and firmly establishes its success within the Indian cinema landscape.
key_points: Major milestone for Ranveer Singh's film

Entertainment.headline: Victoria Beckham conferred with Legion of Honour; David shares touching post, Brooklyn takes a dig - PICS
Entertainment.summary: Victoria Beckham has been awarded the prestigious Legion of Honour, France's highest civilian decoration, recognizing her contributions to fashion and culture. Her husband David shared a touching tribute on social media, while her son Brooklyn light-heartedly "took a dig," adding a personal touch to the celebration, as seen in various shared pictures.
key_points: Victoria Beckham receives Legion of Honour

Sports.headline: MS Dhoni starts preparations ahead of IPL; CSK share practice video - Watch
Sports.summary: Cricket legend MS Dhoni has officially commenced his rigorous preparations for the upcoming Indian Premier League season, much to the excitement of fans. Chennai Super Kings (CSK) amplified this anticipation by sharing a practice video, showcasing his early training.

Sports.headline: Wrists working, runs flowing — how Suryakumar Yadav found form again
Sports.summary: This article intricately details how cricketer Suryakumar Yadav successfully regained his formidable form, emphasizing the critical role of refined wrist work in his batting technique. His return to peak performance is a significant boost for his team and an inspiration to aspiring players.

Science.headline: Stonehenge mystery solved? Study reveals how 25-tonne stones reached the site in southern England
Science.summary: A groundbreaking new study claims to have finally unraveled the long-standing mystery of how the massive 25-tonne stones of Stonehenge were transported to their ancient site in southern England. The detailed findings could revolutionize our understanding of ancient engineering techniques and the capabilities of prehistoric societies.
key_points: Study claims to solve Stonehenge mystery
Could revolutionize understanding of ancient engineering

Science.headline: Australian study finds heart cells can regenerate post-heart attack; India’s leading cardiologist calls it a ‘big step’
Science.summary: An Australian study has made a potentially revolutionary discovery, finding compelling evidence that heart cells possess the ability to regenerate after a heart attack. A leading Indian cardiologist has enthusiastically hailed this finding as a "big step" in cardiac treatment, offering new hope for recovery and therapeutic interventions for heart patients worldwide.
key_points: Australian study finds heart cell regeneration
Leading Indian cardiologist calls it "big step"
Offers new hope for cardiac treatment

Health.headline: Why PM Narendra Modi mentioned Ashwagandha in his speech: 4 brilliant ways to include it in daily meals
Health.summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi's recent mention of Ashwagandha in his speech has brought renewed attention to this revered ancient herb and its health benefits. The article delves into the potential reasons for his emphasis and provides four effective and practical ways to incorporate it into daily meals for optimal well-being.
key_points: PM Modi mentioned Ashwagandha in speech
Highlights renewed attention on ancient herb
Provides 4 ways to include it in daily meals

Health.headline: How To 'Walk' Your Way Out Of Diabetes, High BP?: Brisk walks after meals lower blood sugar
Health.summary: This health article highlights the significant benefits of incorporating brisk walks after meals as a simple yet effective strategy for managing and potentially preventing chronic conditions like diabetes and high blood pressure. Research suggests that this practice can effectively lower blood sugar levels and contribute to overall cardiovascular health.
key_points: Brisk walks after meals are beneficial
Helps manage diabetes and high blood pressure
